channel.title: User_data.subscription in new keyauth
channel.description: hey i before use keyauth and for get the key level i use (KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscription == "vip") but in new update keyauth i cant find subscription how i check subscription ?

item.title: User_data.subscription in new keyauth
item.dc:creator: Pooya
item.description:
hey
i before use keyauth and for get the key level i use
(KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscription == “vip”)
but in new update keyauth i cant find subscription
how i check subscription ?
